trans-unit.source: Paints an area with a linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Maler et område med lineær gradering.

trans-unit.source: A LinearGradientBrush paints an area with a linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: En LinearGradientBrush maler et område med lineær gradering.

trans-unit.source: A linear gradient defines a gradient along a line.
trans-unit.target: Lineær gradering definerer gradering langs en linje.

trans-unit.source: The line's end points are defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> properties of the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Sluttpunktet for den linjen er definert av den <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>Egenskaper for lineær gradering.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: A LinearGradientBrush brush paints its <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops%2A> along this line.
trans-unit.target: En LinearGradientBrush velgeren maler dens <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops%2A>langs denne linjen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default linear gradient is diagonal.
trans-unit.target: Standard lineær gradering er diagonal.

trans-unit.source: In the default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> of a linear gradient is (0,0), the upper-left corner of the area being painted, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> is (1,1), the lower-right corner of the area being painted.
trans-unit.target: I standard, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>er (0,0) lineær gradering øverst til venstre for området som males, og den <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>er (1,1) nederst til høyre for området som malt.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The colors in the resulting gradient are interpolated along the diagonal path.
trans-unit.target: Fargene i de resulterende graderingen interpolert langs diagonal banen.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a diagonal gradient.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser diagonal gradering.

trans-unit.source: A line was added to highlight the interpolation path of the gradient from the start point to the end point.
trans-unit.target: En linje ble lagt til fremheve interpolering banen til gradering fra startpunktet til sluttpunktet.

trans-unit.source: ![Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient") A diagonal linear gradient The next illustration shows the same linear gradient, but with highlighted gradient stops.
trans-unit.target: ![Gradering aksen for diagonal lineær gradering](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "gradering aksen for diagonal lineær gradering") diagonal lineær gradering neste illustrasjonen viser samme lineær gradering, men med merkede gradering stopper.

trans-unit.source: ![Gradient stops in a linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-4gradientstops.png "Gradient stops in a linear gradient") A diagonal linear gradient with highlighted gradient stops It is possible to specify a gradient axis that does not completely fill area being painted.
trans-unit.target: ![Gradering stopper i lineær gradering](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-4gradientstops.png "gradering stopper i lineær gradering") diagonal lineær gradering med merkede gradering stopper det er mulig å angi en gradering akse som ikke fullstendig fyller området blir malt.

trans-unit.source: When this occurs, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod%2A> property determines how the remaining area is painted.
trans-unit.target: Når dette skjer, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod%2A>egenskapen bestemmer hvor området Gjenværende males.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features A LinearGradientBrush is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: Freezable funksjoner A LinearGradientBrush er en type <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekt, og derfor kan være låst for å forbedre ytelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>Funksjoner, for eksempel fryse og kloning, se [oversikt over Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>For velgeren initialiseres til <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"></xref> class that has the specified gradient stops.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"> </xref> klasse som ikke har de angitte gradering stopper.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>For velgeren initialiseres til <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*> to set on this brush.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>til å angi for denne velgeren.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"></xref> class that has the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"></xref> and angle.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"> </xref> klasse som ikke har den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"> </xref> og vinkel.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>For velgeren initialiseres til <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*> to set on this brush.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>til å angi for denne velgeren.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the angle, in degrees, of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>som representerer vinkel i grader på graderingen.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.0 creates a horizontal gradient, and a value of 90.0 creates a vertical gradient.
trans-unit.target: Verdien 0,0 oppretter vannrette gradering, og verdien 90.0 oppretter en loddrett gradering.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"></xref> class that has the specified start <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref>, end <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref>, and angle.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"> </xref> klasse som har de angitte start <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref>, slutt <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref>, og vinkel.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>For velgeren initialiseres til <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> at offset 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> ved forskyvningen 0,0.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> at offset 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> ved forskyvningen 1.0.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the angle, in degrees, of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>som representerer vinkel i grader på graderingen.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.0 creates a horizontal gradient, and a value of 90.0 creates a vertical gradient.
trans-unit.target: Verdien 0,0 oppretter vannrette gradering, og verdien 90.0 oppretter en loddrett gradering.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"></xref> class that has the specified gradient stops, <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"> </xref> klasse som ikke har de angitte gradering stopper <> </> *>, og <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>For velgeren initialiseres til <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*> to set on this brush.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>til å angi for denne velgeren.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*> of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*>på graderingen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*> of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*>på graderingen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"></xref> class that has the specified start <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref>, end <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"> </xref> klasse som har de angitte start <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref>, slutt <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref>, <> </> *>, og <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>For velgeren initialiseres til <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> at offset 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> ved forskyvningen 0,0.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> at offset 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref> ved forskyvningen 1.0.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*> of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*>på graderingen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*> of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*>på graderingen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"> </xref>, gjør dype kopier av verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, denne metoden kopierer ressursen referanser og data bindinger (men de kan ikke løse) men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush"> </xref> objektet gjør dype kopier av gjeldende verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Refererer til ressursen, databindinger og animasjoner kopieres ikke, men er gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ending two-dimensional coordinates of the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir sluttverdi todimensjonal koordinatene til lineær gradering.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> paints a gradient along a line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>maler gradering langs en linje.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: The line's start and end points are defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> and EndPoint properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: Start- og sluttpunktet for linjen er definert av- <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>og sluttpunktet egenskaper for <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default linear gradient is diagonal.
trans-unit.target: Standard lineær gradering er diagonal.

trans-unit.source: In the default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> of a linear gradient is (0,0), the upper-left corner of the area being filled, and its EndPoint is (1,1), the lower-right corner of the area being filled.
trans-unit.target: I standard, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>lineær gradering er (0,0) øverst til venstre for området som fylles, og endepunktet er (1,1) nederst til høyre for området som fylles.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The colors in the resulting gradient are interpolated along the diagonal path.
trans-unit.target: Fargene i de resulterende graderingen interpolert langs diagonal banen.

trans-unit.source: The following image shows a diagonal gradient.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser diagonal gradering.

trans-unit.source: The black line was added to highlight the interpolation path of the gradient from the start point to the end point.
trans-unit.target: Svart linje ble lagt til fremheve interpolering banen til gradering fra startpunktet til sluttpunktet.

trans-unit.source: ![Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient") A diagonal linear gradient ## Specifying Relative or Absolute Values Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> determines whether its EndPoint is interpreted as a relative or absolute value.
trans-unit.target: ![Gradering aksen for diagonal lineær gradering](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "gradering aksen for diagonal lineær gradering") diagonal lineær gradering ## angir Relative eller absolutte verdier Legg merke til at den <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>for en <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>bestemmer om endepunktet tolkes som en relativ eller absolutt verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> specifies that the EndPoint value is relative to the size of the painted area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>av <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>angir at EndPoint-verdien er i forhold til det malte området.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> specifies that the EndPoint value is expressed in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>av <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>angir at endepunktet verdien uttrykkes i enheten uavhengig piksler.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>, making the EndPoint a relative value.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>, slik at endepunktet for en relativ verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The ending two-dimensional coordinates of the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Sluttverdi todimensjonal koordinatene til lineær gradering.

trans-unit.source: The default is (1,1).
trans-unit.target: Som standard brukes (1,1).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting two-dimensional coordinates of the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir start todimensjonal koordinatene til lineær gradering.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> paints a gradient along a line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>maler gradering langs en linje.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: The line's start and end points are defined by the StartPoint and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: Start- og sluttpunktet for linjen som er definert av StartPoint og <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>Egenskaper for <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default linear gradient is diagonal.
trans-unit.target: Standard lineær gradering er diagonal.

trans-unit.source: In the default, the StartPoint of a linear gradient is (0,0), the upper-left corner of the area being filled, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> is (1,1), the lower-right corner of the area being filled.
trans-unit.target: Standard StartPoint for lineær gradering er (0,0) øverst til venstre for området som fylles, og den <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>er (1,1) nederst til høyre for området som fylles.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The colors in the resulting gradient are interpolated along the diagonal path.
trans-unit.target: Fargene i de resulterende graderingen interpolert langs diagonal banen.

trans-unit.source: The following image shows a diagonal gradient.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser diagonal gradering.

trans-unit.source: The black line was added to highlight the interpolation path of the gradient from the start point to the end point.
trans-unit.target: Svart linje ble lagt til fremheve interpolering banen til gradering fra startpunktet til sluttpunktet.

trans-unit.source: ![Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient") A diagonal linear gradient ## Specifying Relative or Absolute Values Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> determines whether its StartPoint is interpreted as a relative or absolute value.
trans-unit.target: ![Gradering aksen for diagonal lineær gradering](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "gradering aksen for diagonal lineær gradering") diagonal lineær gradering ## angir Relative eller absolutte verdier Legg merke til at den <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>for en <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>bestemmer om StartPoint tolkes som en relativ eller absolutt verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> value is relative to the size of the painted area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>av <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>, angir dette at det <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>verdien er i forhold til det malte området.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> specifies that the StartPoint value is expressed in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>av <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>angir at verdien StartPoint uttrykkes i enheten uavhengig piksler.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>, making the StartPoint a relative value.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>, slik at StartPoint en relativ verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The starting two-dimensional coordinates for the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Start todimensjonal koordinatene for lineær gradering.

trans-unit.source: The default is (0, 0).
trans-unit.target: Standardverdi (0, 0).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
